name: TIFY
description:
TIFY is a data science startup revolutionising the way businesses execute market sentiment analysis. Founded by a computer scientist with experience in marketing, TIFY has now grown its team and built a proprietary software which helps brands manage their online reputation, generate real-time consumer insights, and identify new market trends. With an expanding data science analytics market predicted to reach a size of US $ 203 billion by 2024, TIFY has already entered the space by delivering value to companies like Juventus F.C. and MAMOQ. Our competitive advantage lies in our state of the art technology which makes the product stand out from the competition in terms of usability and cost. Driven by the vision of an ethical and reliable use of AI, we built TIFY with the goal of giving the power of data science to everyone. With TIFY, sentiment analysis is as easy as a Google search. 

We are part of the King's 20 Accelerator 2018/19 cohort, and the Google for Startups program.

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative (SDR)
jobs.description:
We are looking for a positive mindset results-driven SDR to actively seek out and engage established and potential customers. 

Responsibilities:  
- Provide solutions for every customer in order to boost revenue growth, 
  customer acquisition, and profitability.
- Promote and sell TIFY’s platform using solid arguments to existing and 
  potential customers. 
- Reach out to potential customers through cold calling.
- Coordinate sales efforts with team members. 
- Supply the team with a clear understanding of customer needs, problems, 
  interests, competitive activities, and potential of the TIFY platform.
- Analyse market potential, track sales, and achieve sales OKRs (objectives 
  and key results) within schedule.
- Establish, develop and maintain strong and positive business and customer 
  relationships. 
- Book meetings with decision makers in our ideal client companies. 
- Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to 
  meet their needs.
- Always be up to date with the best strategies and promotional trends.

About you: 
- Experience in B2B Sales and/or Software sales.
- Genuinely curious and open to feedback.
- Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills.
- Humble: continuously willing to learn and improve, not acting as you know 
  everything. 
- Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience needs.
- Active listener, paying full attention to customers and their needs.
- Critical and agile thinker, speaking in specifics and understanding what’s not 
  being said. 
- Enthusiasm and a drive for PR and ethical brand management.
- Always be up to date with market trends and be a subject matter expert.
